channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Hurricane 360
channel.desc: In the aftermath of Hurricane Katrina, the city of New Orleans slips into anarchy as the residents struggle for survival.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Hurricane 360
channel.desc: Hurricane Irene carves a path of destruction along the East Coast; rivers reach hundred-year-flood levels or higher, washing whole towns and villages off the map.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: America's Weekend Headquarters
channel.desc: The science and stories of weather, plus in-depth forecasts with a focus on weekend weather.

channel.title: America's Weekend Headquarters

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Weekend Recharge
channel.desc: Though it has "weekend" in the title, this show discusses the week ahead in addition to offering suggestions for what to do on Saturday and Sunday. Weather Channel meteorologists go beyond the elements outside and into the realm of lifestyle tips. Each host has a recurring segment on "Weekend Recharge," which include helping parents get a fresh start to each day and explaining how the weather is expected to impact the weekend's scheduled sports action.

channel.title: Pattrn

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: The World's Funniest Weather
channel.desc: A streaker interrupts a live newscast; a skier gets stuck on a jungle gym while attempting a stunt.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: The World's Funniest Weather
channel.desc: A TV anchorman is unaware of a fist fight going on behind him during a newscast; leaked water from a burst pipe freezes and turns a car into a giant ice cube; a dog plays a variety of instruments with its nose.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: The World's Funniest Weather
channel.desc: Highlights of past funny weather clips.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: The World's Funniest Weather
channel.desc: A morning show is interrupted when a sweepstakes winner curses live on air; a man comes up short when he attempts to leap from a garage to a trampoline to a pool; a snowboarder loses his grip on a tow line and takes out a bunch of skiers with him.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Storm Stories: The Next Chapter
channel.desc: A dog named Bella awakens her family just in time take cover as tornadoes hit Nashville in March 2020, but Bella goes missing; a huge dust storm called a "haboob" engulfs Phoenix, AZ.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Storm Stories: The Next Chapter
channel.desc: Two powerful tornadoes take aim at a Nebraska farming community at the same time; a super-rare but super-dangerous tornado of fire terrorizes a California town.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Deadline to Disaster
channel.desc: Storm chasers and a school principal experience close calls as a tornado outbreak hits major metropolitan areas in Texas.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Deadline to Disaster
channel.desc: In 1991, Andover, Kan., is slammed by a deadly F5 tornado; 31 years later, another powerful twister wrecks the town again.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Deadline to Disaster
channel.desc: Hurricane Ida strikes the Louisiana coast 16 years after Hurricane Katrina, following a destructive path from the low-lying parishes to the cities of the Northeastern United States.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Timber Titans
channel.desc: As the Peter's crew races to finish a long-delayed logging job, a critical machine failure threatens their deadline and their paychecks; the Integrated Operations team braces for lift-off as the heavy-lift helicopter arrives on the block.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Timber Titans
channel.desc: In the aftermath of one of British Columbia's largest wildfires, the Tsideldel team works to salvage timber from a burned mountain, until an unexpected incident threatens to halt the operation.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Timber Titans
channel.desc: On a sun-scorched block, the Peters crew struggles to move massive logs with aging machines and no margin for error.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Weird Earth
channel.desc: A twisting swarm of menacing aerial creatures glides above the suburbs; bizarrely parting seas suggest connections to ancient legends; a volcano produces deadly hair-like fibers.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Weird Earth
channel.desc: A devastating river of mud and rocks threatens a sleepy mountain valley; bizarre patterns beneath a frozen river may be strange morphing creatures; a jellyfish-shaped cloud may be a sign of dangerous weather to come.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Weird Earth
channel.desc: Flammable snow could be an international danger; black smoke with a mind of its own; a giant red dome that appears to defy the laws of physics.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Heroes & Survivors
channel.desc: Storm chasers turn first responders after a terrifying tornado rips through a town; a life hangs in the balance when a wind fueled blaze burns out of control in a construction site.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Heroes & Survivors
channel.desc: College sweethearts trapped on a mountain; freakish storm turns a sailing regatta into a deadly duel with nature on the high seas.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Heroes & Survivors
channel.desc: In a year of extreme weather, raging fires, deadly mudslides, and horrific hurricanes, communities rally together to save themselves from disaster.

channel.title: Heavy Rescue: 401
channel.desc: Chad Grenier deals with a spun-out tractor; Bill Wright brings his new rotator to a dangerous corner of the 401; the Herb's Towing crew faces a major challenge when a semi barrels across both sides of the highway.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Heavy Rescue: 401
channel.desc: A heavy crew must remove a load of industrial glass panels from a buckled trailer; a double wreck pushes crews into a tense race; Gary gives a rookie operator the chance to learn the ropes at a difficult scene.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Heavy Rescue: 401
channel.desc: Eric and Senior work to coax a semi back on the road.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Heavy Rescue: 401
channel.desc: When a transport rolls on a dangerous curve, John Campbell needs to master his new rotator in a hurry; Duncan Cooper and crew take on a full load of medical supplies dumped on the side of the highway.

channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Rocky Mountain Wreckers
channel.desc: Charlie struggles with a surprise storm on Vail Pass; Brendan faces pressure after a promotion; Cory's rigging and patience are tested by a heavy manure load.[(96057)]
